name: Cedaridge Ministries
description: Cedaridge Ministries was a non-profit Christian organization based in Williamsburg, Kentucky, dedicated to helping the needy and homeless in Southeastern Kentucky. The organization provided food assistance, clothing, furniture, and other essential items to families in need. Founded in 1993, Cedaridge Ministries served the Appalachian region through their Christian assistance programs. IMPORTANT: This organization is permanently closed and no longer providing services.
source: Verified from official website, Google Business listing, and multiple online directories
eligibility: Previously served needy and homeless individuals in Southeastern Kentucky
notes: PERMANENTLY CLOSED - This organization is no longer in operation. Founded in 1993, Cedaridge Ministries was a Christian non-profit that provided food, clothing, and furniture assistance to the poor and homeless in Southeastern Kentucky. The organization had multiple locations including Factory Lane in Williamsburg.
